price: 112. (Alle) wuxuu odhan: “Immisa sano baad joogteen arlada?”
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
